# Leaderboard {-#lb1}

## Batting Leaderboard {-}

```{r}
list_sheets <- c('M1', 'M2', 'M3', 'M4', 'M5', 'M6', 'M7', 'M8', 'M9')

out_bat <- map_df(1:9, ~lb_bat(i=list_sheets[.x]))

tab_bat <- out_bat %>% group_by(Player) %>%
  summarise(Innings = n(),
            Runs = sum(Runs),
            `4s`= sum(`4s`),
            `6s` = sum(`6s`)) %>%
  arrange(desc(Runs))

datatable(tab_bat)
```

## Bowling Leaderboard {-}

```{r}
list_sheets <- c('M1', 'M2', 'M3', 'M4', 'M5', 'M6', 'M7', 'M8', 'M9')

out_bowl <- map_df(1:9, ~lb_bowl(i=list_sheets[.x]))

tab_bowl <- out_bowl %>% group_by(Player) %>%
  summarise(Innings = n(),
            Overs = sum(Overs),
            Runs = sum(Runs),
            Wickets = sum(Wickets)) %>%
  arrange(desc(Wickets))


datatable(tab_bowl)
```
